meanings.definition: A substance or material used to make something stiff or rigid.
meanings.sent1: The cardboard stiffener kept the envelope from bending.
meanings.sent2: The metal stiffener in the hat brim helped it keep its shape.
meanings.sent3: The paper stiffener decided to take up yoga to become more flexible.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the stiffener that held her resolve together.
meanings.sent5: The starch in the shirt collar acted as a stiffener, making it stand upright.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes something stronger or more resilient.
meanings.sent1: The mentor was a great stiffener of the team's spirit.
meanings.sent2: Positive feedback can be a powerful stiffener of self-confidence.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm was believed to be a stiffener against bad luck.
meanings.sent4: Laughter acted as a stiffener, bonding the group together.
meanings.sent5: The support of friends served as a stiffener during tough times.
